First and foremost, I am NOT doing this nor do I plan to since that would be a waste of money and time. But if I or some user got banned from Avicus and returned with an alt, would that be against the rules and considered ban-evading? I'm just curious.

Warm regards,
TheBron_cool

replies.body: But how would you find out?
replies.body_tagged: But how would you find out?

replies.body: Usually you can find out by tracking each players ip. If two players ip match it usually means that they are being used in the same location which is how you can find out. If a player is using a VPN (virtual private network) this method doesn't really work.
